mordred.EState module¶

class mordred.EState.AtomTypeEState(type='count', estate='sLi')[source]¶

Bases: EStateBase

atom type e-state descriptor.

Parameters:

  • type (str) – one of aggr_types

  • estate (str) – one of es_types

Returns:

NaN when type in [“min”, “max”] and \(N_{\rm X} = 0\)

References

  • doi:10.1021/ci00028a014

since = <Version('1.0.0')>¶
description()[source]¶
aggr_types = ('count', 'sum', 'max', 'min')¶
